page.title: 07Buxton:Teenage comments
page.content: The weather is sometimes fairly warm in summer, although it is cold in winter. The town is fairly old, although there are some new developments.Tourists provide a source of income but are also a nuisance due to litter and occasional overcrowding. The facilities for teenagers vary, e.g., youth clubs, recreation areas, swimming baths. In summer there are train rides and crazy golf. There is a cinema. Most children hang around the parks and the streets because there is nothing really interesting to do. Buxton could do with a night club or more regular discos. For some people a BMX track would be an added attraction.
